title: A Complete List of Data Science Online Classes
dc:creator: Data Lover
description:
Originally posted on Hi, I'm Scott:
The blog is now migrated to http://scottge.net/2015/06/08/complete-list-of-data-science-online-classes/ You can consider online classes from Coursera for self-study.  Coursera provides online classes (most of them are free) offered by university professors, typically attended worldwide by thousands of students and working professionals. In particular, consider the Data Science Specialization from John Hopkins…
